title: 152: Addiction & Recovery w/ Alexis Haines
itunes:title: 152: Addiction & Recovery w/ Alexis Haines
description:
The Broads are joined by podcaster and former reality TV personality, Alexis Haines aka Alexis Neiers previously known as the star of E!’s “Pretty Wild” and involvement in the “Bling Ring”. But Alexis speaks with The Broads all about her nearly fatal experiences with substance abuse, struggles with family, jail, and more before her recovery that led her to becoming a trained birth doula, licensed drug counselor, running Alo House Recovery Centers with her husband, and creating the “Recovering From Reality” podcast.
ALEXIS HAINES:
Website: https://www.recoveringfromreality.com (https://www.recoveringfromreality.com/)
Book: https://www.recoveringfromreality.com/my-book
Podcast - "Recovering From Reality": https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/recovering-from-reality/id1453429239
“Life Reset” Course: https://recovering-from-reality.teachable.com/p/life-reset-course/
Instagram: @itsalexishaines
THANK YOU TO OUR SPONSORS: 
*** MODERN FERTILITY: Modern Fertility is offering our listeners $20 off the test when you go to MODERNFERTILITY.COM/CHATTY (http://modernfertility.com/CHATTY)
*** EVERLYWELL: For 20% off an EverlyWell at-home lab test, visit EVERLYWELL.COM/CHATTY (http://everlywell.com/CHATTY) and enter code CHATTY
*** KIWICO: Get your first month free on selected crates at KIWICO.COM/CHATTY (http://kiwico.com/CHATTY)
*** BEST FIENDS: Download Best Fiends FREE on the Apple App Store or Google Play
*** HISMILE: Get 20% off sitewide by going to HISMILETEETH.COM (http://hismileteeth.com/) and entering code CHATTY20 at checkout!

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
